summary: The diff implements all four requirements for GIF sharing. Backend adds 'gif' field to Message type with migration support. Frontend adds URL validation, extraction logic, input handling with toast errors, and rendering of GIF images in ChatMessageItem with proper styling. All acceptance criteria appear covered.

hallucinated_features.description: Migration module (backend/migration.mo) for transforming old Message records without 'gif' field to new format
hallucinated_features.reason: Migration or schema evolution was not requested in the BuildRequest. The request only specified updating the Message type to support GIF URLs, not providing backward compatibility or data migration logic.
